PtSituationElement.Summary: M1/M1
PtSituationElement.Description: M1/M1
PtSituationElement.LongDescription:
M1/M1 LTD, M4/M4 LTD and Q32 - South/Westbound holiday bus stop changes in Midtown

Until Sat, Jan 6, 2018

Buses will not stop on 5 Av at 49 St. Please use the nearby stop on 52 St instead.
Local buses also stop on 46 St.

Reminder: M1 LTD and M4 LTD buses do not operate weekends.

Note: Thursday, Nov 23, buses operate on a Sunday schedule.

Q70 SBS buses are fare free for the Thanksgiving holiday week

Until 11:59 PM Sun, Nov 26

Ride free on the LaGuardia Link Q70 SBS. Customers do not have to
obtain a Select Bus Service ticket and may board at any door.

Click here for LaGuardia Airport travel advisories.

Note: Customers transferring to the subway will still have to pay the subway fare.
